mapper.select: SELECT T1.PDLV_DV_CD /* 출고지구분코드 */ , T1.PDLV_NO /* 출고지번호 */ , T1.PDLV_NM /* 출고지명 */ , T1.ZIP /* 우편번호 */ , (CASE WHEN T1.PDLV_DTL_ADR IS NOT NULL THEN T1.PDLV_ADR || ' ' || T1.PDLV_DTL_ADR ELSE T1.PDLV_ADR END) AS PDLV_ADR /* 출고지주소 */ FROM TB_SVPD_PDLV_BAS T1 /* 출고지기본 */ INNER JOIN (SELECT M1.NEW_ADR_ZIP, M1.EMD_SN, M1.FR2P_LGLD_CD, M1.CTPV_NM, M1.CTCTY_NM, M1.LAWC_EMD_NM, M1.AMTD_NM, M1.KYNOR_LOCARA_YN, M1.ILD_YN, M1.PDLV_NO FROM TB_SVPD_EGER_ASN_ADR_IZ M1 WHERE M1.EMD_SN = (SELECT MAX(EMD_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_EGER_ASN_ADR_IZ WHERE NEW_ADR_ZIP = M1.NEW_ADR_ZIP AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ) T2 /* 엔지니어배정용주소내역 */ ON T2.NEW_ADR_ZIP = T1.ZIP WHERE T1.PDLV_DV_CD = 'Z' AND T2.CTPV_NM = #{ctpvNm} AND T2.CTCTY_NM = #{ctctyNm} ORDER BY T1.ZIP
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_SVPD_EGER_ASN_ADR_IZ /* 엔지니어배정주소내역 */ SET PDLV_NO = #{pdlvNo} /* 출고지번호 */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND NEW_ADR_ZIP = #{newAdrZip} /* 신주소우편번호 */ AND EMD_SN = ${emdSn} /* 읍면동일련번호 */
